column5: Ok, folks, get your nominations in and then we'll vote on it. Everybody else seem to hit us with such lists at year end. Why not OFC? So, let's' see your nominations in the Best Thread and Worst Thread categories over the past year.  Let' keep it fun though---no re-hashing of old arguments that went on, and on, and on in some of the 'worst' threads. Lets's see if we can get this rolling w/o going downhill!
You got a better chance of stapling water to a tree than this making it off the first page before it goes downhill.   Please prove me wrong.   Art

No specific post for me...   My favorites are Limey's fishing posts/videos with his little fella in them..... Gives me experiences to look foreword with my little guy....  The worst.... All the NF threads that get 5-10 times the replies that fishing reports/questions get....  ...
Is that "NF"??  Maybe we should have 2 categories 'NF'  and  'F'   Rick
Worst ones are the polictical threads that CAN'T be worked out because it is all opinion and all politicians are liars anyways.
Best threads: any with fish porn in them.... Worst threads: Any post with "Maple Leafs" in it.
So almost none of yours… And about half of yours….

Can't wait to see everyones favourites!   Best: Mike's Sutton River Journal.  I haven't seen that many amazing photos in one place ever before. What a joy it was to read and view. (Thanks again for sharing Mike)  Worst: I'll have to sleep on that.    edit: spelling mistake
The Sutton River Journal will be hard to beat, although the Tree River posts are always a favourite for me...
Best: I'm split between moosebunks arctic char (others as well) and Mike/Bill's sutton river.
Goes for 90% of people on here as well. The other 10% are trolls...
I don't see anything good coming from this thread. Just call me Kreskin.
